message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. While the product is appealing,  $11,500 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

I understand that $10,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $11,000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
